name: Simple Rain
author: inferno
description: A simple comic like rain effect with 2 lines of code
image_code:
float hash2(vec2 uv) { 	return fract(sin(uv.x * 455.78 + uv.y / 34532.14) * iTime * 13.9);}
void mainImage( out vec4 fragColor, in vec2 fragCoord ){ vec2 uv = (fragCoord.xy / iResolution.xy); fragColor = vec4(mix(vec3(0.0),vec3(1.0),smoothstep(0.95,1.0,hash2(uv))),1.0);}
